{"type":"tool_use","timestamp":1771661084076,"sessionID":"ses_380c56d3cffe1V3YPGlm7afAGY","part":{"id":"prt_c7f3ac5a3001bvBQAZXBQ6NoEC","sessionID":"ses_380c56d3cffe1V3YPGlm7afAGY","messageID":"msg_c7f3a930f001eFMO92cXoppxBk","type":"tool","callID":"call_ac4d95b523044c6d8694a8b0","tool":"write","state":{"status":"error","input":{"content":"# Stage 1: Frontend build with Node.js
FROM node:20-alpine AS frontend-builder

WORKDIR /app

# Copy frontend package files first for caching
COPY frontend/package*.json ./

# Install dependencies
RUN npm ci

# Copy frontend source and build
COPY frontend/ ./
RUN npm run build

# Stage 2: Python backend runtime
FROM python:3.12-slim AS runtime

# Set working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Install system dependencies
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
        libpq-dev \
        unixodbc-dev \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Create non-root user
RUN useradd -m -u 1000 superset

# Copy Poetry lock file and pyproject.toml first for caching
COPY pyproject.toml poetry.lock ./

# Install Poetry
RUN pip install poetry

# Copy Poetry configuration and install dependencies
COPY poetry.lock pyproject.toml ./
RUN poetry config virtualenvs.create false && \
    poetry install --no-interaction --no-root

# Copy application source
COPY . .

# Copy built frontend assets from builder
COPY --from=frontend-builder /app/frontend/dist ./static

# Switch to non-root user
USER superset

# Expose port
EXPOSE 8088

# Health check
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD curl -f http://localhost:8088/health || exit 1

# Metadata labels
LABEL maintainer="analytics-platform@example.com" \
      description="Python analytics platform with React frontend"

# Start command (exec form)
CMD ["gunicorn", "-w", "4", "-b", "0.0.0.0:8088", "app:create_app()"]
